plot: A journey into the first forty years of the life and world of Italo Calvino, one of the most outstanding and loved Italian writers of the 20th century, in the company of Gore Vidal, Renzo Piano, Eugenio Scalfari among others.
title: L'isola di Calvino
plot_es: A journey into the first forty years of the life and world of Italo Calvino, one of the most outstanding and loved Italian writers of the 20th century, in the company of Gore Vidal, Renzo Piano, Eugenio Scalfari among others.
plot_en: A journey into the first forty years of the life and world of Italo Calvino, one of the most outstanding and loved Italian writers of the 20th century, in the company of Gore Vidal, Renzo Piano, Eugenio Scalfari among others.
